summary: A documentary that follows jazz legend Clark Terry over four years to document the mentorship between Terry and 23-year-old blind piano prodigy Justin Kauflin as the young man prepares to compete in an elite, international competition.
cast: Candy|Terri Lyne Carrington|Quincy Cavers|Bill Cosby|Herbie Hancock|Quincy Jones|Frank Kauflin|Justin Kauflin|Phylis Kauflin|Sandi McCree|Mulgrew Miller|Kevin Neaton|Harold O'Neal|Dianne Reeves|Arturo Sandoval|Clark Terry|Gwen Terry
title: Keep on Keepin' On
